name: Here & Now
description:
Sometimes, following a conversation among friends can be difficult. Follow Sam and her three friends in their conversations after their examinations. Maybe, hearing may not be as easy as it seems?

A Game brought to you by NUS students for NM4227 Playable Art:

Producer : Chermin Tan

Game Designer: Regine Goh

Concept Art: Phan Qiao-Wen

Programmer: Johan Ng

Game Tester: Cheong Kah Jun
